title: Can't post in boards
body: Hello, for some bizzare reason I can't post anywhere on boards in EUW the server I play in even tho I'm lvl 21 in the game, it seems I don't even have level 1 on Boards, I can't post, I can't comment, I can't even rate comments. I was only able to write thread here, please help.

replies.body: Yea sometimes you just need to post in Help & Support to get your boards and Summoner levels synced up with each other. You should be able to freely post anywhere now.
Well I still can't post anything in EUW boards, not even in Help & Support section...
